Activity: Start the day with enthusiasm! Offer a friendly greeting to all colleagues and share a smile.
Review patient reports and updates in the EHR system. Prioritize any urgent tasks or notifications related to influenza assessments.
Continue patient assessments, concentrating on clear and concise data entry into the EHR. Be attentive and responsive to patient needs.
Double-check if all the tasks are meeting the expectation of @qatest-1. @PEOPLE = @qatest-1 Topic: QA Expectation
Lunch with @rn-3 in the cafeteria. Share personal stories and enjoy a good laugh.
Focus on documenting symptoms and lab results accurately in the EHR system. Pay close attention to detail and ensure completeness.
Analyze the concerns of @qatest-1 and try to implement the suggestion.
Collaborate with @rn-2 to discuss any challenging cases or workflow improvements. Share insights and best practices.
Prepare for shift handover, summarizing patient status and updating the EHR accordingly.
Finalize the daily review and submit shift report. Reflect on accomplishments and challenges.
Head home, looking forward to relaxing and recharging for tomorrow.
